item.title: Post: Added an Emacs config based off of nano-emacs
item.description: screenshot of the Emacs setup in question, with org-roam-ui nearby A lot of fiddling with Emacs today. Thought I’d try something not so much “vanilla” as on fewer predetermined rails than the average Doom Emacs config. This new config starts from nano-emacs, a rather streamlined setup. Of course I enjoyed cluttering it up.
item.content:encoded:
screenshot of the Emacs setup in question, with org-roam-ui nearby

A lot of fiddling with Emacs today. Thought I’d try something not so much “vanilla” as on fewer predetermined rails than the average Doom Emacs config.

This new config starts from nano-emacs, a rather streamlined setup. Of course I enjoyed cluttering it up.
